vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
παροικ-ία, ἡ,
(πάροικος [Refs] sojourning in a foreign land, [LXX+NT]; οἱ ἐν τῇ π., ={οἱ ἐκτός}, [Refs]
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
residence as a stranger sojourning
a sojourning, temporary residence in a foreign land, residence as a stranger Acts 13:17; 1Pet. 1:17*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
1) 旅居, 寄居他鄉 ((徒 13:17)
3) 隱喻人一生在世如同旅居過客 (彼前 1:17)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
1) 旅居, 寄居他乡 ((徒 13:17)
3) 隐喻人一生在世如同旅居过客 (彼前 1:17)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: sự kiều ngụ; tạm trú. Xem G3941
